Reference

KEGG analysis

Functions used for KEGG

read_ko()

Read the output of KofamScan/KofamKoala or KAAS.

mapping_ko()

Maps KOs to the KEGG database.

InterProScan analysis

Functions used for InterProScan analysis

read_interpro()

Extract abundance profile of InterProScan output.

Manipulate KEGG/InterproScan profile

Functions used to manipulate the KEGG/InterproScan profile

get_subset_unique()

Unique abundance profile.

get_subset_pca()

Metabolism PCA.

get_subset_pathway()

Subsets the mapped KO table based on pathways.

calc_binary()

Calculate presence/absence.

calc_percentage()

Calculate the percentage.

Plot KEGG/InterproScan profile

Functions used to plot the KEGG/InterproScan profile

plot_bubble()

Bubble plot.

plot_heatmap()

Heatmap
